price: Ni chemchem watakao inywa waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu, wakiifanya imiminike kwa wingi.
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
footnotes: Hiyo ni chemchem wanayo inywa waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu, na wanaipitisha watakapo kwa sahala.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
